body: The army ignores the Defense of fortifications. It automatically succeeds at checks to withdraw. Ethereal travel and similar effects also grant this ability. An army with teleportation can travel to any hex on the same day (its speed is irrelevant and not hampered by difficult terrain).
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Mass Combat/Special Abilities/Teleportation
name: Teleportation
